moves.name: Discharge
moves.description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.

moves.name: Charge
moves.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Trick
moves.description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Uproar
moves.description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: Shock Wave
moves.description: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.

moves.name: Ominous Wind
moves.description: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.

moves.name: Electro Ball
moves.description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Hex
moves.description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems.

moves.name: Charge
moves.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Discharge
moves.description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.
